main_text:
Mill’s Utilitarianism
2. Mill’s Utilitarianism

Though Mill accepts the utilitarian legacy of the Radicals, he
transforms that legacy in important ways. Part of understanding
Mill’s contributions to the utilitarian tradition involves
understanding his disagreement with the Radicals on issues about human
motivation and the nature of happiness.
